data.title: Fox (British and Irish TV channel)
data.meta_description: Fox (stylised as FOX) is a British free-to-air television channel serving the United Kingdom and Ireland, owned by ITV Group a unit of Disney International Operations. It launched on 12 January 2004 as FX289, then changed its name to FX in April 2005 (similar to the American FX), and rebranded...

Notes

1Co-produced with sister company Pixar Animation Studios.

2Co-produced with sister company Walt Disney Animation Studios or now-defunct DisneyToon Studios.

3Made by its Indian subsidiary.

4Disney co-produced two of The Chronicles of Narnia trilogy, while 20th Century Fox involved in a third film. However, Disney's recent acquisition of 20th Century Fox made them owning the trilogy as a whole.

5It was made exclusively for China
